00043 /**********************************************************************/
00044 // CONSTRUCTOR:  Low (All fundamental information)
00045 /**********************************************************************/
00046 
00047 Low::Low(float aStartTime, float aDuration, int aType, char * aName)
00048   : Event(aStartTime, aDuration, aType, aName) {
00049 
00050   lowID += 1;
00051   bottomID = 0;
00052   setStartTime(aStartTime);
00053   setDuration(aDuration);
00054   setType(aType);
00055   setName(aName);
00056   double aDensity = .5;
00057   setDensity(aDensity);
00058 }

00106 /*********************************************************************/
00107 // PUBLIC:  Print
00108 /*********************************************************************/
00109 void Low::Print() {
00110 
00111   *outputFile << "  ................................................................" << endl;
00112   *outputFile << "  #LOW " << lowID << ":  " << theName << endl;
00113   *outputFile << "  #  StartTime:  " << setw(7)<< theStartTime * uPerSec << 
00114     " units  " << setw(8) << theStartTime << setw(4) << "sec" << endl;
00115   *outputFile << "  #  Duration:   " << setw(7) << theDuration * uPerSec << 
00116     " units  " << setw(8) << theDuration << setw(4) <<"sec" << endl;
00117 }
